item.title: 丝绸之路》的制作者们意犹未尽
item.description: Cherry 团队的开发人员告诉我们，他们正在为其热门动作游戏开发新内容【原文：The developers at Team Cherry tell us they’re working on new content for their popular action game】

item.title: 世贸组织称关税前置结束，全球货物贸易放缓
item.description: 世界贸易组织称，随着今年早些时候因美国关税前置订单而产生的提振作用减弱，上一季度全球商品贸易放缓。【原文：Global merchandise trade slowed last quarter as the boost seen earlier this year from front-loading of orders ahead of US tariffs faded, the World Trade Organization said.】

item.title: 财政预算案后投注目标为英国央行减息放缓带来的 1,000 万英镑收益
item.description: 如果英格兰银行从现在到 6 月只降息一次，那么在英国预算案公布后进行的交易将获得 1,000 万英镑（1,320 万美元）的十倍回报。【原文：Trades made in the aftermath of the UK budget will score a tenfold return of £10 million ($13.2 million) if the Bank of England cuts rates only once between now and June.】

item.title: 西班牙猪肉出口受到 31 年来首次猪瘟的威胁
item.description: 在三十多年来首次出现非洲猪瘟病例后，西班牙的猪肉生产受到威胁。【原文：Spain’s pork production is under threat following the first cases of African swine fever in more than three decades.】

item.title: 受制裁油轮在土耳其附近爆炸后面临沉没风险
item.description: 据报道，俄罗斯影子船队的一艘油轮触雷，有可能在土耳其海岸线以北沉没。【原文：An oil tanker from Russia’s shadow fleet reportedly hit a mine and was at risk of sinking north of Turkey’s coastline, a local port agent said.】

item.title: 南非电力公司业绩稳定，Eskom 盈利激增 36
item.description: 南非国有电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 上半年利润攀升了 36%，原因是该公司稳定了电力供应，并计划进行大规模输电扩建和增设可再生能源部门。【原文：Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.’s first-half profit climbed 36% as South Africa’s state-owned-power utility stabilizes supply and looks ahead to undertake a major transmission expansion and add a renewable-energy division.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Pagaya 提高 3.99 亿美元次级债交易定价
item.description: Pagaya Technologies Ltd. 被迫提高资产担保债券的销售利率，因为该贷款机构面临着投资者更严格的审查。【原文：Pagaya Technologies Ltd. was forced to offer higher rates on an asset-backed bond sale as the lender faces heightened investor scrutiny.】

item.title: 铜矿商 SolGold 称已拒绝中国收购要约
item.description: 正在厄瓜多尔寻求开发铜矿的矿业公司 SolGold Plc 表示，已拒绝了中国江西铜业股份有限公司的第二次收购要约。【原文：Mining company SolGold Plc, which is seeking to develop a copper mine in Ecuador, said it’s rejected a second takeover offer from China’s Jiangxi Copper Co.】

item.title: 西班牙电信和 DAZN 获得 2032 年西班牙足球电视转播权
item.description: 西班牙足球甲级联赛（LaLiga）已授予西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）和 DAZN 集团有限公司国内转播权，每家公司有权转播西班牙顶级联赛每赛季五场比赛，预计每赛季转播费超过 10 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：Spain’s football league LaLiga has granted Telefónica SA and DAZN Group Ltd the domestic broadcast rights for five matches each of the country’s top-flight competition in a deal estimated at over €1 billion ($1.2 billion) per season.】

item.title: CME 交易恢复，美国股市上涨，美联储降息押注稳定
item.description: 由于芝加哥商品交易所在早些时候发生故障后重新开始运营，而且交易商坚守对美联储下月降息的预期，美国股市周五连续第五个交易日上涨。【原文：US stocks rose Friday for a fifth-straight session as the Chicago Mercantile Exchange restarted operations following an earlier outage and traders held firm to expectations for a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 出现 "冷却问题 "的 CME 数据中心曾是奥罗拉的旗舰站点
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）证实，发生故障并导致全球市场中断的数据中心位于伊利诺伊州奥罗拉市。【原文：The CME Group data center that malfunctioned and caused a wave of disruption across global markets is located in Aurora, Illinois, the exchange has confirmed.】

item.title: 高盛交易员称市场将以 "更干净 "的布局进入 12 月
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The S&P 500 may end November essentially flat, but the path forward looks meaningfully clearer as volatility calms down, stock market breath improves and trend-following strategies turn into buyers, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s trading desk.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金即将投资莱昂纳多业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，经过数月谈判，沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在就投资莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）航空结构部门进行深入谈判。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in advanced talks to invest in Leonardo SpA’s aerostructures unit following months of negotiations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 央行官员认为哥伦比亚加息的可能性增加
item.description: 据一位资深央行官员称，随着通胀前景恶化，最近几周哥伦比亚需要开始加息的可能性增加了。【原文：The chance that Colombia will need to start raising interest rates has increased in recent weeks as the inflation outlook soured, according to a senior central banker.】

item.title: 地产大亨福克斯在伦敦离婚判决后面临牢狱之灾
item.description: 伦敦一名法官在监督 3750 万英镑（4960 万美元）的离婚裁决时，裁定地产大亨迈克尔-福克斯（Michael Fuchs）因违反有关出售房地产资产的命令而犯有藐视法庭罪，因此他将面临牢狱之灾。【原文：Property tycoon Michael Fuchs is facing a jail term after a London judge, overseeing a £37.5 million ($49.6 million) divorce award, ruled he was in contempt of court for breaching orders over the sale of real estate assets】

item.title: 阿达尼首席财务官称将向谷歌数据中心投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 据首席财务官朱格希德-辛格（Jugeshinder Singh）称，由亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）领导的印度企业集团正计划向谷歌即将在印度南部建立的人工智能基础设施中心投资多达 50 亿美元，这表明投资正源源不断地涌向快速增长的数据中心业务。【原文：The Indian conglomerate, led by billionaire Gautam Adani, is planning to invest as much as $5 billion in Google’s upcoming AI infrastructure hub in southern India, according to Chief Financial Officer Jugeshinder Singh, showing the steady stream of investments pouring in the fast-growing data center business.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所恢复交易，美国天然气期货上涨
item.description: 随着芝加哥商品交易所恢复交易，美国天然气期货上涨，中西部和东部部分地区受到寒冷天气的影响，预测显示未来几周东北部和五大湖区的气温将低于正常水平。【原文：US natural gas futures rose as trading resumed on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange and wintry weather hits parts of the Midwest and East, with forecasts showing below-normal temperatures in the coming weeks for the Northeast and Great Lakes.】

item.title: 现货白银突破十月峰值后再创新高
item.description: 白银跃升至创纪录的水平，超过了 10 月份伦敦市场出现历史性挤压时创下的峰值。【原文：Silver jumped to a record, surpassing a peak set during a historic squeeze in the London market in October.】

item.title: 墨丘利金属公司总裁称铜价上涨 "是大事件
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）金属部负责人科斯塔斯-宾塔斯（Kostas Bintas）再次对铜价作出了看涨预测，他警告说，急于将金属运往美国有可能消耗掉世界其他地区的库存。【原文：Kostas Bintas, the high-profile head of metals at Mercuria Energy Group Ltd., has renewed his bullish prediction for copper prices as he warned that a rush to ship metal to the US risks draining the rest of the world’s inventories.】

item.title: 淡马锡以 46 亿美元的首次公开募股前价格入股 Quest Global
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正在就收购 Quest Global Services Pte 股份进行深入谈判，这笔交易将使这家工程服务公司的估值达到 46 亿美元。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek Holdings Pte is in advanced talks to buy a stake in Quest Global Services Pte, a deal that will value the engineering services firm at $4.6 billion, according to people with knowledge of the development.】

item.title: BI 称，Monte Paschi 首席执行官调查是 Mediobanca 交易的不利因素
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，针对 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 首席执行官路易吉-洛瓦格里奥（Luigi Lovaglio）的法律调查可能会增加该公司整合其最近收购的竞争对手 Mediobanca SpA 的难度。【原文：The legal probe targeting Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio is likely to make it harder for the firm to integrate Mediobanca SpA, the rival it recently acquired, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 财政部长表示与国际货币基金组织关系紧张，塞内加尔债券走势疲软
item.description: 塞内加尔财政部长谢赫-迪巴（Cheikh Diba）表示了对该国财政状况的持续担忧，突显了该国在寻求新计划的过程中与国际货币基金组织在政府流动资金以弥补赤字问题上的紧张关系，此后塞内加尔主权债券下跌。【原文：Senegal’s sovereign bonds fell after Finance Minister Cheikh Diba flagged persistent concerns about the country’s finances, highlighting ongoing tensions with the International Monetary Fund over government liquidity to finance its deficit as it seeks a new program.】

item.title: 12 月份利润汇款将对巴西雷亚尔产生影响
item.description: 12 月份，巴西可能会有多达 100 亿美元的利润和红利汇款流出，这可能会再次对雷亚尔造成压力，并促使央行采取新的干预措施。【原文：Brazil may see as much as $10 billion in profit and dividend remittances leave the country in December, potentially renewing pressure on the real and prompting fresh central bank intervention.】

item.title: 加拿大经济因军事和住房问题大幅反弹
item.description: 随着加拿大经济增长的驱动力转向住房和政府支出，加拿大经济从贸易战最初的破坏中大幅反弹。【原文：The Canadian economy rebounded sharply from the initial damage of the trade war as the country’s growth drivers shifted to housing and government spending.】

item.title: 印尼央行称仍有进一步下调关键利率的空间
item.description: 印尼央行行长佩里-瓦尔吉约（Perry Warjiyo）表示，印尼央行正在寻找进一步下调基准利率的空间，并预测未来两年经济将强劲增长，尽管存在一系列全球风险，包括贸易形势和脆弱的市场。【原文：Bank Indonesia is looking for room to further cut its benchmark interest rate, Governor Perry Warjiyo said, forecasting robust economic growth in the next two years despite a range of global risks including the trade situation and fragile markets.】

item.title: 惠誉评级上调，赞比亚摈弃五年违约标签
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将赞比亚的信用等级上调至 B-，前景稳定。赞比亚美元债券收益率走低。【原文：Zambia has shaken off five years with a debt-default tag, with Fitch Ratings upgrading its assessment of the southern African nation’s credit to B- and a stable outlook. Yields on its dollar bond edged lower.】

item.title: 博洛雷获法院支持避免维旺迪股东赔款
item.description: 文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）在争取避免向维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）股东支付可能代价高昂的赔偿金（作为去年媒体集团解体的一部分）的斗争中，得到了法国最高法院的支持。【原文：Vincent Bolloré got a boost from France’s top court in his fight to avoid a potentially costly payout to Vivendi SE shareholders as part of last year’s breakup of the media conglomerate.】

item.title: 德国通胀跃升至九个月高点，欧洲央行思考前景
item.description: 德国通胀率意外升至九个月来的最高水平，在欧洲中央银行今年最后一次会议之前提醒人们，物价稳定的风险依然存在。【原文：Germany’s inflation rate unexpectedly rose to the highest level in nine months, offering a reminder before the European Central Bank’s final meeting of the year that risks to price stability remain.】

item.description:

item.title: 纹身墨水在体内移动，杀死免疫细胞，削弱疫苗反应
item.description: 纹身墨水并不只是静静地留在皮肤里。新的研究表明，纹身墨水会迅速进入淋巴系统，并在那里存留数月，杀死免疫细胞，甚至干扰人体对疫苗的反应。【原文：Tattoo ink doesn’t just sit inertly in the skin. New research shows it moves rapidly into the lymphatic system, where it can persist for months, kill immune cells, and even disrupt how the body responds to vaccines.】
